r6:
**Rainbow Six Siege Statistics**

```m.r6 cas|casual <username> pc|xbl|psn```Gets a user's stats for casual play.

```pfxr6 rnk|ranked <username> pc|xbl|psn```Gets a user's stats for ranked play.

```pfxr6 topop|operator <username> pc|xbl|psn```Gets a user's stats for their most played operator. Add a number at the end to move trough the list.

```pfxr6 misc|general <username> pc|xbl|psn```Gets additional stats on a user unrelated to game mode.
mb:
**Mailbox Commands**

```pfxmb post|send <message text>```Post a message to your followers. after submitting a post you have 5 minutes to edit or delete it before it is sent.

```pfxmb pull|check```Get posts from all the users and announcement channels you are subscribed to since the last time you checked.

```pfxmb notify```Subscribe to the guild's announcement channel if they have one set (must be used in the desired guild).

```pfxmb unnotify```Unsubscribe from the guild's announcement channel if you were subscribed (must be used in the desired guild).

```pfx sub|follow```Subscribe to a user to receive their posts if they send any.

```pfx unsub|unfollow```Unsubscribe from a user to stop receiving their posts.

```pfx subscriptions|mysubs```View a list of your current subscriptions.
lol:
**League of Legends Statistics**

```pxflol user|summoner <in game name>```Get basic League of Legends user stats.
pubg:
**Player Unknown's Battlegrounds Statistics**

```pfxpubg stats <region> <username> <game-mode>```Gets a player's statistics for a given game mode.

Available modes```solo, solo-fpp, duo, duo-fpp, squad, squad-fpp```
Available regions```xbox-as, xbox-eu, xbox-na, xbox-oc, pc-krjp, pc-jp, pc-na, pc-eu, pc-ru, pc-oc, pc-kakao, pc-sea, pc-sa, pc-as```
nts:
**Note To Self Commands**

```pfxnts make|note|create <text> <attachments>```Make a note for yourself and GSC will pin it in your DMs with it. Supports message file attachments.

```pfxnts view|list|get```Gets a list of your current notes.

```pfxnts delete|rem|unnote <list position>```Using the position number of a note from the list command you can delete a note. Unpinning it will also remove it from the list.
ow:
**Overwatch Statistics**

```pfxow stats <Battle tag> pc|xbl|psn quickplay|competitive```Gets a user's verall stats for a game mode.

```pfxow medals <Battle tag> pc|xbl|psn quickplay|competitive```Gets a list of a user's medales for a game mode.

```pfxow hero <Battle tag> pc|xbl|psn quickplay|competitive <hero name>```Gets a complete list of stats for a user's given hero if they have played them.
spotify:
**Spotify Commands**

```pfxspotify search|lookup <song name>```Search for a song by name on Spotify, returns top 3 results.

```pfxspotify new|releases <page #>```Browse the top 100 new relases 10 at a time using the optional page number.

```pfxspotify album|adetail <new release #>```Get a more detailed album view for an album on the top 100 new releases list using its position number

```pfxspotify playlists|plists|pl```Get 5 playlist suggestions
weather:
**Weather Commands**

```pfxweather <location> C|F```Get the current weather for a location, Fahrenheit is default.

```pfxweather forecast|fc <location> C|F```Get the 3 day forecast for for a location
remind:
**Reminder Commands**

```pfxremind me|set <reminder text> in <time><unit>```Set a reminder, the bot will DM you your reminder at the specified time unit is one of m, h, d, w, M, y from minutes to years default if no unit set is minutes.

```pfxremind view|list```Shows a list of your upcoming reminders and lets you delete them using reactions.
help:
**General Help**

Game Stats Central aims to provide a plethora of game statistics and handy community features!

_To find out what commands are available for each module use pfxhelp <module name>_

Available Game Statistics: _[module](game)_
```md
[lol](League of Legends), [r6](Rainbow Six Siege), [ow](Overwatch), [pubg](Player Unknown's Battlegrounds)```

Features: _[module](capabilites)_
```md
[mb](Mailbox commands let you stay up to date with friends and server announcements)
[nts](Conveniently create and view notes for yourself)
[remind](Create, view, and remove reminders)
[weather](Get the weather and 3 day forecast for any location on Earth)
[spotify](Get new releases, playlist suggestions, and search for songs by name)
[chan](Set announcement, Spotify, and stream channels)
[tools](Clean DMs with the bot, and configure the prefix)
```
